animal.question: I have a long trunk and big ears. I love to eat peanuts. Who am I?

hints.text: I'm often seen in a circus.
I can use my nose to spray water.

animal.question: I say 'meow' and love to chase mice. I purr when I'm happy. Who am I?

hints.text: I love to play with yarn.

animal.question: I have a long neck and spots all over my body. I eat leaves from tall trees. Who am I?

hints.text: I eat leaves most animals can't reach.

animal.question: I live in the ocean and have eight arms. I can change color to hide. Who am I?
I roar loudly and am known as the king of the jungle. I have a big mane. Who am I?

hints.text: I am a very powerful animal.
I live in Africa and Asia.

animal.question: I hop around and love to eat carrots. I have long ears. Who am I?
I waddle and lay eggs. I live in cold places. Who am I?

hints.text: I like to live in Antarctica.

animal.question: I am a reptile with a hard shell. I move very slowly. Who am I?

hints.text: I can live a very long time.
I eat plants and sometimes insects.
I can retract my head into my shell for safety.

animal.question: I fly at night and use echolocation to find my way. People think I'm a bit spooky. Who am I?

hints.text: I can eat fruits, insects, or even blood depending on the species.

animal.question: I'm a master of disguise, blending seamlessly into my surroundings. I have independently moving eyes. Who am I?

hints.text: I can change color to match my environment.
I live in warm climates and climb trees.

transport.question: I have wheels and carry people, but I'm not a car. I often stop to pick people up. What am I?
I have two wheels and pedals, and you use your feet to make me go. What am I?

hints.text: 🤸 You use your legs to power me.
⛑️ It's a good idea to wear a helmet when riding me.

transport.question: I travel on tracks, and I can carry many passengers very quickly. What am I?

hints.text: ⚡ I can be powered by electricity.

transport.question: I fly in the sky and carry people to far away places. What am I?
I sail on water and can be very big. What am I?

hints.text: ⚓ I use an anchor to stay in place.
🚢 I can carry cargo or passengers.

transport.question: I can travel on land and water, and I'm often used by the military. What am I?
I fly with spinning blades on top, and can hover in one place. What am I?

hints.text: 🚨 I'm often used for rescue missions.

transport.question: I travel deep underwater, and allow people to explore the ocean. What am I?
I am designed to travel beyond Earth's atmosphere, often carrying astronauts. What am I?

hints.text: 👨‍🚀 People train for a long time to ride me.

transport.question: I move along a zip line, carrying people across valleys or forests. What am I?

hints.text: 🧗 I'm often part of an adventure course.
🌲 You can see beautiful views from me.
